title: Oxfordshire Live: Thursday 3 November - BBC News
summary: member of a gang that sexually abused a teenage girl in oxford has been jailed for nine years .
shaken baby sceptic dr waney squier cleared .
10,000 drivers caught twice for being distracted while driving .
grove-based f1 team williams announces new driver .
thames valley police stop 102 cyclists in oxford not displaying working lights on bicycles .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for reading , we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 gmt with more news , sport , weather and travel from around oxfordshire .

documents.title: charlotte campbell in the studio
text: singer songwriter charlotte campbell was in the studio today to speak to nick piercey , ahead of her gig at the unicorn in abingdon tonight .

documents.title: works at foresters tower begins
text: oxford city council 's £ 20m tower blocks repair project has moved onto foresters tower in wood farm .
it 's the fourth tower to undergo repairs following works at evenlode and windrush towers in blackbird leys and cowley 's hockmore tower .
work on the final tower , plowman in northway , begins next month .
it is hoped the lifespan of the towers will be extended by about 30 years .
we have now officially launched the repair works for foresters tower
maybe you should repair the inside before you spend millions on the outside

documents.title: cherwell district council joint chief exec to stand down
text: the joint chief executive of cherwell district and south northamptonshire councils has announced she will step down from her post .
author: Banbury Guardian

documents.title: police : 'sexual predator naim khan now off streets of oxford '
text: speaking following the sentencing of naim khan at oxford crown court today , senior investigating officer , det ch insp mark glover , of major crime , said he used the supply of class a drugs to `` groom a vulnerable girl , [ which ] enabled him to indecently and sexually assault her on numerous occasions '' .
he added : `` khan also used his mobile phone to take indecent images of a vulnerable victim ; an offence to which he pleaded guilty due to the weight of evidence against him .
whilst these offences happened some time ago the seriousness of them should not be underestimated .
i am glad this sexual predator is now off the streets of oxford and is instead in prison . ''

documents.title: travel update : lane blocked on a40 london road westbound
text: one lane is blocked and there 's queuing traffic on the a40 london road westbound in oxford between thornhill park and ride and the collinwood road junction , because of an accident involving two cars .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: oxford shaken baby sceptic cleared
text: an oxford doctor , who was struck off the medical register , has today been cleared of giving dishonest evidence in court cases involving so-called `` shaken baby cases '' .
dr waney squier , worked as a consultant neuro-pathologist at the john radcliffe hospital in oxford .
a high court judge has concluded the findings by a medical tribunal had significant flaws .

dr waney squier was appealing against the tribunal 's conclusion that she had given `` dishonest and misleading '' evidence in a number of cases where a parent or carer was accused of harming or killing their child .
author: BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: chimney fire caused by birds nest
text: oxfordshire fire and rescue service was mobilised on tuesday evening to deal with a chimney fire in over norton , west oxfordshire , that had been caused by a birds nest catching fire.crews were able to extinguish the fire but have advised chimney owners to regularly sweep them to minimise the chance of fires .
watch manager kevin jeffrey said : `` have your chimney swept at least once a year , ideally before you light your first log or coal fire .

`` do n't let the sparks fly , make sure embers are under control , put out properly before you go out or to bed and use a british standard fire guard to prevent sparks escaping and store firewood away from fire places or stoves as there is a risk of accidental ignition via radiated heat , particularly over a period of time . ''

documents.title: khan 's victim left with 'shattered life '
text: reacting to the sentencing of naim khan for the sexual abuse of an oxford teenager , an nspcc spokesman said : `` the impact of khan 's barbaric actions will have untold consequences for the young victim .
`` she will need years of support to rebuild her shattered life .
`` an offender like khan needs more than just locking up .
in prison he must be placed on an effective treatment programme to ensure he does n't pose a risk to children when he is released . ''

documents.title: man jailed for sexually abusing teenager
text: a member of a gang that sexually abused a teenage girl in oxford has been jailed for nine years .
naim khan , 38 , of herschel crescent , oxford , was convicted in july of indecent assault and possession of class a drugs with intent to supply .
his victim was plied with drink and drugs and passed around `` like a piece of meat '' , oxford crown court heard .

documents.title: police stop 102 cyclists riding without lights
text: thames valley police roads carried out cycle light checks in oxford yesterday stopping 102 cyclists not displaying working lights on their bicycles .
the checks took place as part of the ongoing cycle lights scheme , which is now run all-year-round across the force .
officers were on the high street , oxford , between 17:30 and 18:30 .

any cyclists stopped had three options : to either pay an on-the-spot £ 50 fixed penalty notice , complete an online cycle safety diversion course costing £ 30 , or challenge the matter in a magistrates ' court .
most of those stopped indicated a preference for completing the safety course .

documents.title: watch : taking on a t-rex
text: a model of one of the world 's best-preserved tyrannosaurus rex has been given to a school in moulsford .
and it 's got the pupils thinking .
just how would you see off a t-rex ?

documents.title: thousands caught twice driving distracted
text: almost 10,000 drivers have been caught twice for being distracted while driving , including using a mobile phone , in the last four years .
more than 600 people were caught three times and one driver five times , data from a bbc radio 5 live freedom of information request to the dvla shows .
road safety charity brake says the findings show authorities are not taking the offence `` seriously enough '' .
the findings come in the same week that tomasz kroker was jailed for 10 years for causing a crash which killed a mother and four children .

documents.title: oxford city stars bid to reach top level put on ice by city council
text: oxford city stars ' bid to become one of the top ice hockey teams in britain is being thwarted by a lack of support from the city council , club bosses have said .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: oxford man arrested after box of fireworks used in car arson
text: a man has been arrested after a box of fireworks was used to set fire to a car in oxford .
police said the back window of a blue honda civic parked on a driveway in abingdon road was smashed at 22:00 bst on 22 october .
a large box of lit fireworks was placed on the back seat and caused `` extensive damage '' to the car , police added .
a 25-year-old man from oxford has now been arrested on sus of arson with intent to endanger life .

documents.title: good morning
text: good morning and welcome to another foggy morning in oxfordshire .
on bbc local live today we 'll be bringing you the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the county .
you can be part of the conversation via email , facebook and twitter .
